name: PIÑATA 2GO 5-Point Star
description: Our piñatas are made from recycled cardboard plus tissue paper for decoration. Piñata2go fuses tradition with innovation, combining the most representative piñata of Mexican culture, such as the 5-pointed star, with a modern, avant-garde, functional approach to storage, distribution and transportation. We have 7 color combinations of the standard size of a star piñata. All our piñatas are foldable, so they are practical and functional, making them easy to move and store.
featuers: FUNCTIONAL: Foldable Piñata with functional design to maximize storage and transportation
AS SEEN ON SHARK TANK: Project funded by 2 Sharks in Shark Tank Mexico Show
READY FOR THE PARTY: Assemble your PIÑATA 2GO in seconds and fill it with up to 8.8 lbs of candy (4 Kg)
